languages.text: "Мы не можем ждать решения слишком долго. Те, что нашли спасение в реальном мире, слишком... слишком долго пребывают там". {n}В голосе друкари звенит страх.{/n} "Мы вынуждены драться друг с другом. Вынуждены искать мук в крови сородичей. Не медли — найди нашу ставку в соседней звездной системе — там наш рейд скрывается от происков других кабалов. Поторопись — Сай'лантреш звучит в головах наших соратников все громче с каждым днем".

traits.locale_text: "Мы не можем ждать решения". {n}В голосе друкари звенит сталь.{/n} "Мы воссоединимся с уцелевшими кабалитами в убежище, которое находится в соседней звездной системе. Поторопись".
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."
languages.original_text: "Мы не можем ждать решения слишком долго. Те, что нашли спасение в реальном мире, слишком... слишком долго пребывают там". {n}В голосе друкари звенит страх.{/n} "Мы вынуждены драться друг с другом. Вынуждены искать мук в крови сородичей. Не медли — найди нашу ставку в соседней звездной системе — там наш рейд скрывается от происков других кабалов. Поторопись — Сай'лантреш звучит в головах наших соратников все громче с каждым днем".

traits.locale_text: "We cannot wait long for a solution. Those who found refuge in the realspace have been... have been there for too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry, because the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions is growing louder with every passing he day."

Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Wir können nicht lange auf Eure Entscheidung warten. Jene, die sich in den Realraum geflüchtet haben, sind ... schon zu lange hier." {n}In Kharaels Stimme liegt aufrichtige Angst.{/n} "Wir sind gezwungen, einander zu bekämpfen. Gezwungen, das Leid im Blut unserer Verwandten zu sehen. Zögert nicht, findet unsere Basis in einem benachbarten Sternensystem, in dem sich unser Angriffstrupp vor den Intrigen anderer Kabalen versteckt. Ihr solltet Euch sputen — die Stimme von Sai'lanthresh in den Köpfen unserer Gefährten wird mit jedem Tag lauter."
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: "Wir können nicht lange auf Eure Entscheidung warten. Jene, die sich in den Realraum geflüchtet haben, sind ... schon zu lange hier." {n}In Kharaels Stimme liegt aufrichtige Angst.{/n} "Wir sind gezwungen, einander zu bekämpfen. Gezwungen, das Leid im Blut unserer Verwandten zu sehen. Zögert nicht, findet unsere Basis in einem benachbarten Sternensystem, in dem sich unser Angriffstrupp vor den Intrigen anderer Kabalen versteckt. Ihr solltet Euch sputen — die Stimme von Sai'lanthresh in den Köpfen unserer Gefährten wird mit jedem Tag lauter."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: “我们恐怕没办法等待太久，那些沦落到真实世界的人已经待得……太久了。”{n}卡瑞尔的声音里充满了真切的恐惧。{/n}“我们不得不自相残杀，在同类的鲜血之中寻求折磨。不要耽搁，快来邻近的星系找到我们的基地，我们的小队正在那里躲避其他阴谋团的魔爪。你得动作快点，赛·兰斯雷什的声音在我们脑中一天比一天响亮。”
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: “我们恐怕没办法等待太久，那些沦落到真实世界的人已经待得……太久了。”{n}卡瑞尔的声音里充满了真切的恐惧。{/n}“我们不得不自相残杀，在同类的鲜血之中寻求折磨。不要耽搁，快来邻近的星系找到我们的基地，我们的小队正在那里躲避其他阴谋团的魔爪。你得动作快点，赛·兰斯雷什的声音在我们脑中一天比一天响亮。”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: « Vous devez vous décider rapidement. Ceux qui ont trouvé refuge dans l'espace réel y sont restés... trop longtemps. » {n}Une authentique peur teinte la voix de Kharael.{/n} « Nous devons nous battre les uns contre les autres. Forcés à chercher le tourment dans le sang de notre peuple. Ne tardez pas, trouvez notre base dans un système stellaire voisin. Notre groupe de raid s'y cache, à l'abri des intrigues des autres Kabales. Le temps presse... La voix de Sai'lanthresh résonne chaque jour un peu plus fort dans l'esprit de nos compagnons. »
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez vous décider rapidement. Ceux qui ont trouvé refuge dans l'espace réel y sont restés... trop longtemps. » {n}Une authentique peur teinte la voix de Kharael.{/n} « Nous devons nous battre les uns contre les autres. Forcés à chercher le tourment dans le sang de notre peuple. Ne tardez pas, trouvez notre base dans un système stellaire voisin. Notre groupe de raid s'y cache, à l'abri des intrigues des autres Kabales. Le temps presse... La voix de Sai'lanthresh résonne chaque jour un peu plus fort dans l'esprit de nos compagnons. »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: «No podemos esperar demasiado tu decisión. Quienes se refugian en el espacio real llevan... demasiado tiempo aquí». {n}El miedo en la voz de Kharael es sincero.{/n} «Nos vemos obligados a luchar entre nosotros, a buscar el tormento de la sangre de nuestra gente. No tardes, encuentra nuestra base en un sistema vecino donde nuestra incursión se oculta de las conjuras de las demás Kábalas. Date prisa... la voz de Sai'lanthresh en las mentes de nuestros compañeros se intensifica a cada día que pasa».
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: «No podemos esperar demasiado tu decisión. Quienes se refugian en el espacio real llevan... demasiado tiempo aquí». {n}El miedo en la voz de Kharael es sincero.{/n} «Nos vemos obligados a luchar entre nosotros, a buscar el tormento de la sangre de nuestra gente. No tardes, encuentra nuestra base en un sistema vecino donde nuestra incursión se oculta de las conjuras de las demás Kábalas. Date prisa... la voz de Sai'lanthresh en las mentes de nuestros compañeros se intensifica a cada día que pasa».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: 「我々はあなたの決断を長く待つことはできない。リアルスペースに逃げてきた者たちはずっとここにいる…あまりにも長い間」{n}カラエルの声には真の恐怖が滲んでいる。{/n}「我々は互いを殺し合うように強要されている。一族の血を通して苦しみを求めるように強要されている。もたもたしないでください。他の陰謀団から仲間が隠れている、近くの星系にある我々の基地を探すのです。急いで…仲間たちの頭に聞こえるセランスレッシュの声は日に日に大きくなっている」
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はあなたの決断を長く待つことはできない。リアルスペースに逃げてきた者たちはずっとここにいる…あまりにも長い間」{n}カラエルの声には真の恐怖が滲んでいる。{/n}「我々は互いを殺し合うように強要されている。一族の血を通して苦しみを求めるように強要されている。もたもたしないでください。他の陰謀団から仲間が隠れている、近くの星系にある我々の基地を探すのです。急いで…仲間たちの頭に聞こえるセランスレッシュの声は日に日に大きくなっている」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Kararını çok uzun süre bekleyemeyiz. Gerçekuzaya sığınmış olanlar epey zamandır burada." {n}Kharael'in sesinde samimi bir korku var.{/n} "Birbirimizle savaşmaya zorlandık. Soyumuzun kanında eziyet aramaya zorlandık. Çok oyalanma. Komşu yıldız sistemlerinden birinde bulunan, diğer Kabalların entrikalarından saklanan baskın kuvvetlerimizin sığındığı üssümüze gel. Acele etmelisin, Sai'lanthresh'in sesi her geçen gün yoldaşlarımızın kafasında daha gür yankılanıyor."
languages.original_text: "We cannot wait long for your decision. Those who have found refuge in realspace have been here... too long." {n}Kharael's voice rings with genuine fear.{/n} "We are forced to fight one another. Forced to seek torment in the blood of our kin. Do not tarry, find our base in a neighbouring star system where our raid is hiding from the scheming of other Kabals. You should hurry — the voice of Sai'lanthresh in the minds of our companions grows louder with every passing day."

traits.locale_text: "Kararını çok uzun süre bekleyemeyiz. Gerçekuzaya sığınmış olanlar fazla uzun süredir burada." {n}Kharael'in sesinde samimi bir korku var.{/n} "Birbirimizle savaşmaya zorlandık. Soyumuzun kanında eziyet aramaya zorlandık. Çok oyalanma ve komşu yıldız sistemlerinin birindeki, diğer Kabalların entrikalarından saklanan baskın kuvvetlerimizin bulunduğu üssümüze gel. Acele etmelisin, Sai'lanthresh'in sesi her geçen gün yoldaşlarımızın zihninde daha da güçleniyor."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
